lead_paragraph: Standard & Poor’s cut its credit ratings for BP on Thursday afternoon and warned that it might downgrade its ratings again because of the growing liabilities from the enormous oil spill in the Gulf of Mexico. It also said that BP faced “intense political pressure” in the United States.

headline.main: S.&P. Cuts BP Ratings, Citing Liabilities and Politics
